title: Update regarding Vitality Pharma
story_body:
Vitality Pharma Corp (VIT) Shares Rise on Unconfirmed Acquisition Rumors

At 10:04 AM EST, shares of Vitality Pharma Corp (VIT) began to rise on rumors of a potential acquisition, according to people familiar with the matter. These individuals, who spoke on the condition of anonymity, stated that discussions are ongoing, but no definitive agreement has been reached.

As of 10:17 AM EST, Vitality Pharma Corp (VIT) shares were up 4.2% on the day. The company has not issued any statements confirming or denying the rumors.

It is worth noting that these rumors are unconfirmed and should be treated with caution. While the sources cited are generally considered credible, the information provided is speculative and lacks concrete evidence.

Vitality Pharma Corp (VIT) has not responded to requests for comment on the matter. The company's last public statement was on February 10, 2023, when it reported its quarterly earnings.

Investors are advised to exercise caution and await official confirmation from Vitality Pharma Corp (VIT) before making any investment decisions based on these rumors.
